targets.rawSql: select nodename as metric,numberofcachehits/numberofcachelookups as value from nodesummary where epochtime="${epochvar}"

panels.description: These are the nodes took part in the epiremnt

targets.rawSql: select nodename,nodetype  from nodesummary where epochtime="${epochvar}"

panels.title: Nodes participated in experiment

targets.rawSql: select nodename as metric,numberofcachehits/numberofcachelookups as cacheHits,numberofcachemiss/numberofcachelookups as cacheMiss from nodesummary where epochtime="${epochvar}"
select nodename as metric, numberofrequestshandled as value  from nodesummary where  epochtime="${epochvar}"

panels.title: Number of requests handled by nodes

targets.rawSql: select total_network_time as TOTAL_NETWORK_USAGE_TIME,total_answer_first_time as TOTAL_MINIMUM_TIME_NEEDED_TO_RESOLVE from exp_summery where epoch="${epochvar}"
select total_asks as NumberOfQueries from exp_summery where epoch="${epochvar}"

panels.description: Number of Req Answered vs Forwarded

targets.rawSql: select nodename as metric,numberofcachehits as cacheHits,numberofhddhits as hddHits from nodesummary where epochtime="${epochvar}"

panels.title: cacheHit vs HDD HIT

panels.description: Number of Req Answered vs Forwarded

targets.rawSql: select nodename as metric,numberofrequestsansweredBYME as answeredByNode,numberofrequestsforwarded as forwardedByNode from nodesummary where epochtime="${epochvar}"

panels.title: Number of Req Answered vs Forwarded

panels.description: Number of packets used in the trail

targets.rawSql: select total_network_usage as NumberOfPacketstransfered from exp_summery where epoch="${epochvar}"

panels.title: Number of packets Transfered

panels.description: Average HopCountsUsed to solve the query

targets.rawSql: select ceil(total_minimum_hopcount / total_asks) as AverageMinimumHopsRequiredToResolve from exp_summery where epoch="${epochvar}"

panels.title: Average HopCountsUsedToGetAnswer

targets.rawSql: select concat(total_network_time,"ms") as NumberOfPacketstransfered from exp_summery where epoch="${epochvar}"

select epochtime as time_sec,nodename as metric,numberofrequestshandled,numberofrequestsansweredBYME,numberofrequestsforwarded from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");

panels.title: All trails requests and answer summary

targets.rawSql: select epochtime as time_sec,nodename as metric,numberofcachehits,numberofcachemiss,numberofcachelookups from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
select epochtime as time_sec,nodename as metric,numberofhddhits,numberofhddmiss,numberofhddlookups from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
select epochtime as time_sec,nodename as metric,pc from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
select ceil(avg(total_minimum_hopcount/total_asks)) as AvgHopCount from exp_summery  where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");

panels.title: AVg hop counts req to get reach destination

targets.rawSql: select avg(total_network_usage) as AvgPacketsSent from exp_summery  where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
select avg(pc) from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");

panels.description: Average Time taken to get Answer

targets.rawSql: select concat(sum(total_answer_first_time)/sum(total_asks),"ms") as AvgTimeReqtoAnswer from exp_summery  where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");

panels.title: Avg time req to reach destiantion

targets.rawSql: select epoch as time_sec,concat("Trail",CAST(@a:=@a+1 as int)) metric,total_network_time,total_answer_first_time from exp_summery, (SELECT @a:= 0) AS a where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
select concat(avg(total_network_time),"ms") as AvgNetworkUsage from exp_summery  where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");

list.definition: select hashed as metrics from experiments;
list.description: Choose the Simulation to get details
list.label: Simulation Title
list.name: exp
list.query: select hashed as metrics from experiments;

list.definition: select unique(epochtime) from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
list.description: Choose the epch to get details
list.label: Choose the trails
list.name: epochvar
list.query: select unique(epochtime) from nodesummary where exp_id=(select id from experiments where hashed = "${exp}");
